entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Profiler's `InitializeCurrentThread` returns `CORPROF_E_UNSUPPORTED_CALL_SEQUENCE` #103210
  • `LoggerProviderDebugView` doesn't seem to report the correct log level #103208
  • FieldAccessor can't read RVA field correctly #103207
  • JSexport regression in .NET 9 SDK preview 4 #103205

Closed

  • Mutex.TryOpenExisting intermittently throws IOException #76736
    Future
  • Tests in runtime can't target older version of .NET #103180
  • [WASM] browser-wasm tests fail with "Cannot box IsByRefLike type" #102988
    9.0.0
  • Moving to dotnet 8 causes a sudden increase in the LOH size. #101906
  • Update `INS_serialize` perfscore with accurate numbers. #68917
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Test Only] Force cfg #103215
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add native ARM64 popcount for sizeof(T) above 1 to TensorPrimitives #103214
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Adding support for open generic types in attributes #103213
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Avoid long busy-waiting between hijack retries. #103212
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Convert ReRegisterForFinalize to QCALL #103211
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix `LoggerProviderDebugView.CalculateEnabledLogLevel` when the level is `None` #103209
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Adding some constant folding support for basic floating-point operations #103206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 125.0.6422.141, windows: 126.0.6478.36 #103204
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • [LoongArch64] Fix some failed CoreRoot R2R testcases. #103033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [interp] handle box + brtrue/brfalse and box+isinst+unbox.any patterns up front #103052
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.0
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Adding latency numbers for serialize instruction. #103167
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove some domain stuff from the debugger #103186
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix a few small leaks by properly freeing the result of g_strsplit #103189
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Attempt to fix DuplicateAndClose_TcpServerHandler flaky test #103161
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add basic support for folding and normalizing hwintrinsic trees in morph #103143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2469526 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 5 #103188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: The "RestoreTask" task returned false but did not log an error #41477
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006

PullRequests

Merged

  • Dispose IDisposables in AssemblySymbolLoader #41487
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Two-way binding issue for `Dictionary` values in InteractiveServer component #56145
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #56144
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #56143

Closed

  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextWithFilter #56017

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix Build From Source example #56105
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.6.24302.3 #56034
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • ASP0022 - Fix false positive for groups without using intermediate variables #56116
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • SE.Redis DC backend / HybridCache : add net8.0 TFM #56122
    area-infrastructure, feature-caching
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MacCatalyst build on mac results in "Unknown Scheme", but iOS build working fine. #22942
  • Android exception on HTTPClient post MultipartFormDataContent (to upload a photo) - "unable to convert instance of type 'java.net.urlconnectioninvoker' to type 'java.net.httpurlconnection'" #22939
  • [Windows] Keyboard focus does not shift to a newly opened modal page: Pressing enter clicks the button on the page beneath the modal page #22938
  • Android项目ToolbarItem改变可用状态后字体颜色异常 #22937
  • WinRT.Runtime exception on async file writing #22936

Closed

  • Font Icons in Shell Tabs not showing in iOS #20866

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Release Versioning #22941
  • [Android] Custom shell back button color #22940
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Essentials] Add DateTimeOffset overload in Preferences #22815
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix AdaptiveTrigger not working as expected #20987
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-window
  • Fixes #22914 #22917
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Translation for `Nullable<T>.ToString()` #33942
  • Inconsistent results for `Nullable<bool>.ToString()` #33941
  • Regression on ExecuteUpdate with TimeOnly on SQL Server #33937

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove optimization of `NOT(a != b)` #33943
  • Add test for `null` value in `bool?` column and fix `ToString` conversion #33940
  • [release/8.0] Add missing check for predicate in primitive collection simplifications #33939
    Servicing-consider
  • Simplify `COALESCE` based on the nullability of its arguments #33938
  • Cosmos: Translate string.Contains/StartsWith/EndsWith with OrdinalIgnoreCase #33936

Merged

  • Add missing check for predicate in primitive collection simplifications #33933

Updated

  • Simplify NOT (CASE ... THEN const) by pushing NOT into the THEN/ELSE #33934
  • Fix for #33702 Translation for the SQL Server PATINDEX function #33868
